messages.content: You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击角色，使角色变色
"when this sprite clicked","change [color] effect by [25]"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击角色，使角色一直旋转
"when this sprite clicked","repeat [10]","turn [18] degrees"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击角色，播放音效
"when this sprite clicked","play sound [Guitar Strum] until done"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击角色，使角色跳舞
"when this sprite clicked","move [10] steps","play"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击角色，改变角色尺寸
"when this sprite clicked","repeat [15]","change size by [10]","repeat [15]","change size by [-10]"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击空格，角色旋转并改变颜色
"when [space] key pressed","turn [90] degrees","change [color] effect by [25]"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击角色，使角色滑行
"when this sprite clicked","glide [1] secs to x:[10],y:[100]","glide [1] secs to x:[40],y:[-130]","glide [1] secs to x:[10],y:[100]"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击绿旗，使角色说话
"when green flag clicked","say [Hello!] for [2] seconds","say [Imagine if...] for [2] seconds"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击空格，使角色发出声音并移动
"when [space] key pressed","start sound [pop]","glide [1] secs to [random position]"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
按下左右键，使角色左右移动
"when [right arrow] key pressed","change x by [10]","when [left arrow] key pressed","change x by [-10]"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
按下上下键，使角色上下移动
"when [up arrow] key pressed","change y by [10]","when [down arrow] key pressed","change y by [-10]"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
点击角色，切换到下一个costume
"when this sprite clicked","switch costume to []","wait [0.3] seconds","switch costume to []","wait [0.3] seconds"
You are a Scratch programming expert.

"when this sprite clicked","repeat [2]","set size to [125]%","play sound [Hi Na Tabla] until done","set size to [100]%"

点击绿旗，改变背景并使角色说话
"when gree flag clicked","switch backdrop to [Savanna]","wait [2] seconds","switch backdrop to [Metro]","say [Let's explore] for [2] seconds"
You are a Scratch programming expert.

"when green flag clicked","start sound [your recording]","next costume","say [] for [2] seconds"
You are a Scratch programming expert.

"when green flag clicked","forever","if touching [star] then","play sound [Collect] until done"
You are a Scratch programming expert.
